JOURNAL.CLEAR_FORM_CONTENT: Are you sure you want to clear the form?

CONFIRM_MODAL.THERE_ARE_NO_RECOMMENDATIONS_FROM_AI: There are no recommendations from AI
CONFIRM_MODAL.PLEASE_MAKE_SURE: Please make sure all the information are correct !
CONFIRM_MODAL.ATTENTION: Attention: Saving this voucher means it's permanent on the blockchain. Mistakes can't be fixed. You'll need new vouchers to make corrections.
CONFIRM_MODAL.ADD_ACCOUNTING_VOUCHER: Add Accounting Voucher to the book

VOUCHER.EXPORT_VOUCHER_MODAL_SUBTITLE: Please select the vouchers you want to export
VOUCHER.TOAST_EXPORT_FAILED: Failed to export voucher, please try again later.
VOUCHER.HIDE_VOUCHER_TOGGLE: Hide deleted vouchers and their reversals.
VOUCHER.AT_LEAST_ONE_VOUCHER_CONTENT: Please select at least one voucher to delete
VOUCHER.DELETE_ONE_VOUCHER_TITLE: Do you really want to delete {{voucherNo}}?
VOUCHER.DELETE_ONE_VOUCHER_CONTENT: All the assets that are connected to this voucher will be deleted too.
VOUCHER.DELETE_ONE_VOUCHER_WARNING: A reversal voucher will be created to offset the deleted voucher. The original voucher will remain visible for reference.
VOUCHER.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VOUCHER_TITLE: Do you really want to delete {{count}} vouchers?
VOUCHER.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VOUCHER_CONTENT: All the assets that are connected to these vouchers will be deleted too.
VOUCHER.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VOUCHER_WARNING: Reversal vouchers will be created to offset the deleted vouchers. The original vouchers will remain visible for reference.

ADD_NEW_VOUCHER.TOAST_FAILED_TO_CREATE: Failed to create voucher, please try again later.
ADD_NEW_VOUCHER.TOAST_FAILED_TO_UPDATE: Failed to update voucher, please try again later.
ADD_NEW_VOUCHER.LINE_ITEM_1: Please verify whether the debit and credit sides are balanced.
ADD_NEW_VOUCHER.LINE_ITEM_2: Please ensure that all accounting subjects have been filled in.
ADD_NEW_VOUCHER.LINE_ITEM_3: Please confirm that at least one accounting entry has been added.

ACCOUNT_SELECTOR_MODAL.SUB_TITLE: Select the accounting title that fits

ASSET_SECTION.TITLE: Asset
ASSET_SECTION.EMPTY_HINT: The voucher has been saved successfully. Please make sure to return to this voucher and add at least one asset.

VOUCHER_LINE_BLOCK.EMPTY_HINT: Please add at least 1 accounting voucher!
VOUCHER_LINE_BLOCK.REVERSE_HINT: Please add at least 1 reverse voucher!

VOUCHER_DETAIL_PAGE.TITLE: Voucher
VOUCHER_DETAIL_PAGE.DELETE_MESSAGE_TITLE: Do you really want to delete this Voucher?
VOUCHER_DETAIL_PAGE.DELETE_MESSAGE_CONTENT: All the assets that are connected to this voucher will be deleted too.
VOUCHER_DETAIL_PAGE.VOUCHER_NOT_FOUND: Voucher not found, please make sure the URL is correct.
